q1: Who did Ronaldo replace when he joined Juventus.
q2: The best answer is probably Higuain
a2: Yea it was Higuain. Juventus are a better team with Ronaldo for sure.
q3: Juventus Just had a show on Netflix, right?
a3: Yes, it is a interesting insight into the 2017/2018 season.
q5: Ronaldo is the best replacement for any player
a5: I'm sure he is but he is only one player and needs those around him to make his talent work.
